övrigt.title: 7 Ways To Avoid Walls Of Text
övrigt.summary: Tips for making text content more readable on websites.
övrigt.body:
Narrow the column: There are various guidelines regarding the width of a text column...

Use headings: Headings serve multiple purposes for website content...

Use visuals: Incorporate photos or visualized data...

Use lists: Lists simplify complex information...

Use shorter sentences and paragraphs: Dense paragraphs are outdated...

Blockquote your quotes: Utilize blockquotes to add quote styling...

Allow space: Ensure paragraphs and lines of text have sufficient space around them...
